movie.name: ikea
movie.title: Brad Go "The Ikea Song"
movie.description: Just an ordinary day at the local Ikea.

movie.name: oceanside

movie.description: A surreal and fantastic journey through memories.

movie.name: stc
movie.title: Making of OneRepublic's "Feel Again"
movie.description: See how heartbeats of children in need inspired OneRepublic's new hit song, "Feel Again."

movie.description: The official music video for Delta Rae's "Bottom of the River"

movie.description: The Driver picks up the usual suspects in this high octane thriller.

movie.name: feist
movie.title: Made in China
movie.description: A story about a toy robot who learns what it means to live. Set to Feist's "Now at Last".

movie.name: ipad
movie.title: iPad Face Dance
movie.description: An original music video for Eric Holljes' single 'Good in my Hood', made possible by Apple's Facetime for iPad 2.

data.content: Lawrence Chen is an award winning director of music videos and branded content from Beijing, China. After graduating from Duke University in 2009, he produced work that received numerous awards and recognition at the Cannes Lions as well as the Rome, London, Shanghai, Tribeca, and Cannes Film Festivals. Lawrence is also the filmmaker ambassador for the Pepsi Films program and was selected for SHOOT's 10th Annual New Directors Showcase. He currently resides in New York City and is a producer at BBDO NY.

2012 SHOOT's New Directors Showcase
- New Director
2011 Shanghai Film Festival MOFILM
- 2nd Place: Renaissance "One Night in NYC"
2010 Rome Film Festival MOFILM
- Grand Prize and 1st Place: TEEB "Little Things"
- 1st Place: AT&T "Expand Your World"
- 2nd Place: Pepsi "Mist"
2010 London Film Festival MOFILM
- 1st Place: Snuggle "Paper Shirt"
- 2nd Place: Snuggle "Snuggle Up!"
- 3rd Place: Close Up "Message"
2010 Cannes Lions MOFILM
- 2nd Place: Logitech "Low Resolution Man"
- 5th Place: Diet Coke "Floors"
2010 Tribeca Film Festival MOFILM
- 1st Place: Best Buy "Frames of Mind"
- 2nd Place: Nokia "Hands"
Pepsi Refresh Your World Competition
- 3rd Place: If Kids Ran The World
- 3rd Place: The Dollar
A Journey to the West
- Official Selection - NFFTY 2010
- Official Selection - Oxford Film Festival 2010
- Honorable Mention - 57th Columbus International Film+Video Festival 2009
- Real Ideas Studio Screening - Festival de Cannes 2009

The Good Side
